Help:Node.title: General Concepts: Death
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Death
Important Commands: none
{? equal | $(theatre.gameid) | Marrach | Death happens.
Your character can't die unless you do something to put yourself into danger--such as entering a duel or accepting poisoned wine. But, how much will the court respect you if you never accept food or drink and refuse to duel for your honor, the honor of the court, or the honor of the Queen?
And then, there is the conventional wisdom that says that for some death is only the beginning. Truth or fiction? The necromancer refuses to answer.
| {? equal | $(theatre.gameid) | GES | Death is not currently a factor in Galactic Emperor: Succession, unless you allow the entire Empire to be overrun by the Vl'hurgh. | ChatTheatres are just for fun, not about life and death. } }
See Also: Combat, Injury
